impostermod:Sus.NAME: Sus
DESCRIPTIONS: At start of turn, stun target if Sus greater than or equal to target's total attack intent (consumes all stacks of Sus).

theImposter:Votes.NAME: Vote(s)
DESCRIPTIONS: Increases attack damage and block.  Votes trigger when there are at least 10 Votes on the field: each creature takes damage equal to (10 * their number of Votes), then all Votes are removed.
